page.title: 14Home Life
page.content: I live in an old house that was built in victorian times. we have fire-places in every room. The rooms are very big and high--even the bathroom is big.When we moved in, the kitchen was very old-fashioned,so we have modernised it. We have put in a new door and a complete set of modern furniture. My family consists of my father, my mother, myself, and my younger sister. Every day, my father goes to work. My mother looks after the house, and also does a part-time job. My sister and I go to Blackmoor School. by Alexandra Boddy.
